title: Spell Vamp Quints on AP Junglers on New Jungle
body: Since the new jungle is harder now would Spell vamp quints help more? since need kind of sustain or is it better just to go normal AP stuff to do faster clear just want to see wat other people think about it any comment would help thanks

replies.body: You should just go into a custom and try them out of some champions
Who exactly would you use them on?
Master Yi for sick Alpha Strike plays, obviously.

Actually azingy, a NA Challenger/Master player who mains AP jungle Karthus has always taken spellvamp quints even in the old jungle. I don't see any reason for this to change. In fact, he always took DRing + 2 plots instead of Machete, so I imagine he'd have no trouble sustaining in the new jungle with the new Machete.
Any Champs Karthus,Rumble n such i just like to play  stuff for fun
